description: Age of Empires 2spans 1,000 years, from the fall of Rome through the Middle Ages. Players control the destiny of 1 of 13 civilizations. The game keeps the epic scope ofAge of Empires'gameplay while evolving the combat and economic features. Developed by Ensemble Studios,Age of Empires 2features the expertise of Bruce Shelley, codesigner ofAge of Empiresand the hit strategy gameCivilization.
